price: Bilmez mi ki kabirlerde olanlar alt üst edildiğinde.
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: afalā yaʿlamu idhā buʿ'thira mā fī al-qubūri
